original_text: Every one had four faces apiece, and every one four wings; and the likeness of the hands of a man was under their wings.
korean_text: 각기 네 얼굴과 네 날개가 있으며 날개 밑에는 사람의 손 형상이 있으니

sentences.original_text: Every one had four faces apiece
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 네 개의 얼굴을 가지고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the likeness of the hands of a man
